ALTER TABLE journal_settings ALTER COLUMN setting_type DROP NOT NULL

INSERT INTO journal_settings (setting_name, setting_value, journal_id) SELECT 'enableOai', '1', j.journal_id FROM journals j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.setting_name FROM journal_settings js WHERE js.setting_name = 'enableOai' AND js.journal_id = j.journal_id)
